title: Cafe Landwer - Ibn Gavirol
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Beer/Wine, Middle Eastern, Israeli, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. In early-2016 the entire chain of Landwer cafes added even more vegan items to its menu. Options include breakfast, sandwiches, main dishes, and more. This branch is open 24/7. Casual atmosphere. This branch is wheelchair accessible only to the outdoor seating area.
